GSP28prakp11u:1041: kintu kāryatāṃ budhvā pravṛtto 'ham, mamedaṃ kāryathmati pratītya---ahaṃ
GSP28prakp11u:1051: iṣṭasādhanataiva tu kāryatā, na parā kācit, saiva pravṛttiheturvidhirucyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1065: atītasya 1253vartamānasya ceṣṭasādhanatā'sti, na ca tat kāryatayā'vasīyate
GSP28prakp11u:1067: tathā pravṛttirapi tanmātrāvagamāyattā na bhavatītyupekṣyaiva tāvat taṃ,
GSP28prakp11u:1069: 1254phalasādhanatā nāma yā sā naiva ca kāryatā /
GSP28prakp11u:1076: kintu svayaṃ kleśarūpaṃ karma yatkāryatāṃ vrajet // 8 //
GSP28prakp11u:1081: kāryatā hi na kṛtyadhīnasiddhitāmātrarūpā, kintu kṛtiṃ prati
GSP28prakp11u:1083: tacca kṛteḥ pradhānam, yadadhikṛtya kṛtiḥ pravartate /
GSP28prakp11u:1084: na ca duḥkhaṃ dukhahetuṃvādhikṛtyakṛteḥ pravṛttirupapannā, nāpyaduḥkham,
GSP28prakp11u:1087: tatra na tāvatsvayaṃ sukharūpaṃ karma, sukhasādhanamapi cenna syāt, na tasya kṛtiṃ prati prādhānyāvagamo1257 ghaṭate /
GSP28prakp11u:1091: sukhaṃ hi sarvaḥ kāryatayāvaiti, na tasya phalasādhanatāmapekṣate /
GSP28prakp11u:1099: icchā yadyapi pravṛttihetuḥ, tathāpi sā liṅādivācyā na bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:1108: liṅānadyāvāpe1264 kāryāvagatidarśanāt, taduddhāre cādarśanāt, ta eva kāryāvagatiṃ kurvantīti
GSP28prakp11u:1110: nanu lokavyavahārāt liṅādayo vācakatayā vyutpādyamānāṃ praiṣādiṣvevavacakatayā vyutpattimarhanti
GSP28prakp11u:1114: pravarttyapuruṣāpekṣayā jyāyasā vaktrā pratipādyamānaṃ kāryaṃ praiṣa iti vyapadiśyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1123: praiṣādīnāmapi pravṛttiḥ kāryāvagamanibandhaneti, kāryameva praiṣādivyapadeśayogīti siddham
GSP28prakp11u:1124: vastutastu praiṣādīnāmapi 1267pravṛttyavyabhicāritvātkāryasya ca pravṛttiṣu sarvāsu hetubhūtatvātpraiṣādiṣvapi liṅādīnāṃ kāryamevār'tha iti niścīyate // 12 //
GSP28prakp11u:1129: kṛtau satyāṃ bhāvāt, asatyāñcābhāvādanumānataḥ kṛtisādhyatā tāvadavagamyate /
GSP28prakp11u:1130: yadadhitkṛtya kṛtiḥ pravarttate, tatkṛteḥ pradhānam, prayatnaśca kṛtiḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1131: sa ca mānasapratyakṣavedya iti, viśiṣṭaprayojanatāpi prayatnasya pratyakṣavedyaiva /
GSP28prakp11u:1144: loke hi liṅādiyuktavākyaśravaṇe viśiṣṭakriyānuṣṭhānadarśanāttadviṣayā kāryāvagatirliṅādibhiḥ kriyata iti yuktam, avagati-pravṛttyorekabiṣayatvāt
GSP28prakp11u:1148: tathāhi---dhātureva svārthaṃ bravītu, tathābhūtārthavācinastu dhātoḥ pare
GSP28prakp11u:1150: liṅādiśravaṇe tu tathābhūtārthaṃparatayā1272 dhātuḥ prayukta ityavagamya,
GSP28prakp11u:1155: iti, kriyaiva kāryatayā vede 'pyavagamyata iti, yadyapi
GSP28prakp11u:1163: tena yadyapi lokānusāreṇa kriyāyā eva kāryatayā bodhyamānāyā
GSP28prakp11u:1164: vākyārthatvāt, tadanvayitvāccetareṣāmapi1278 padārthānām, kārakatvādṛte cānyasya kriyānvayitvāsambhavāllohitoṣṇīṣanyāyena
GSP28prakp11u:1172: sādhyaviṣayaiva hi sarvatra kāmanā bhavati, tena tatsambandhātsādhyabhūtaṃ svargādi kāmyamānatayā puruṣaṃ viśinaṣṭi---
GSP28prakp11u:1177: tathāpi prakṛtakāryasādhyatvāvagamo niṣpramāṇaka eva, anyasādhyasyāpi sādhyatvasambhavāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1180: na ca tasya sarvasya sādhanaṃ bhavati, sarvajñatvamapi kecitkāmayante, na ca tasyopāyasambhavaḥ
GSP28prakp11u:1183: dṛśyante hi grāmābhigamanakāmā 1280api yādṛcchikīṣu kriyāsu pravarttamānāḥ
GSP28prakp11u:1184: api ca sarvo 'bhyudayārthyeva1281 puruṣaḥ, tathāpi prāyaśastadvirodhiṣvevendriyārtheṣu pravarttamāno dṛśyate-iti /
GSP28prakp11u:1188: anyathā hi tatkāminā satā tatkāryatayānavabuddhaṃ syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1204: 1285nanu prītimātravacanassvarga iti ṣaṣṭhādye sādhitam, prītisādhaneṣu dravyeṣu svargaśabdaprayogāt
GSP28prakp11u:1205: na ca teṣu svarūpanibandhana eva tatprayogaḥ, prītyapagame tadabhāvāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1206: na ca tatsādhanavacanatā tadanabhidhāne ghaṭate, tadabhidhānābhyūpagame tadvācakataiva /
GSP28prakp11u:1212: na prītimātravacanatayā jyotiṣṭomādicodanāsu svargaśabdasya prayogo 'vakalpate1286, arthavādeṣu duḥkhāsambhinnacirataropabhogyābhilāṣopaneyaprītiśravaṇāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1215: tadānuguṇyena tādaśyāmeva prītau svargaśabdaḥ prayukta iti niścītate /
GSP28prakp11u:1217: ato na karmānantarabhāvinīti, na tatra karmaṇa
GSP28prakp11u:1219: yasmin hi pūrvavarttini yanniṣpādyate, tattasya sādhanamitilokapratītiḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1220: ata eva ca vinaṣṭasyāpi karmaṇaśśāstreṇa sādhanatvaṃ bodhata iti ye
GSP28prakp11u:1222: evaṃ cāsāvāśutaravināśinī kriyā svargakāminā niyojyena saha kāryatayā sambandhuṃ nār'hati, svargaṃ prati sādhanatvānupapatteḥ // 20 //
GSP28prakp11u:1226: tena tasyā api niyojyasaṃbandho ghaṭata eva /
GSP28prakp11u:1229: varaṃ tasyā eva tadanupapattyā ciratarāvasthāyitākalpanā, na punaradṛṣṭasyāśrutasya tadatirekiṇor'thasya kalpanā /
GSP28prakp11u:1235: śaktimati cātīte śaktirapyatīteti pramāṇāntarasiddhamiti, na sāpi sthāyinī
GSP28prakp11u:1241: śakmimaddhi sādhanam, na śaktiḥ kevalā1292, anyathā śaktitvaṃ na syāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1242: devatāprasādasya phalaprayojakatvaśaṅkā 1293nanu yāgādikriyā devatārādhanopāyabhūtā satī kāryatayocyatām, sā tatprattyāsattidvāreṇa kālāntare 'pi phalaṃ janayitumalameva /
GSP28prakp11u:1248: na hi devatārādhanopāyabhūto yāga ityatra kiñcitpramāṇamasti /
GSP28prakp11u:1255: na ca pramāṇāntareṇa devatāsādhanopāyatā ayāgasyāvagamyata ityuktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1256: ato devatoddeśena dravyatyāgo yāga iti, gauṇaṃ
GSP28prakp11u:1261: pramāṇaviruddhameva 1294vigrahavataśca pratipattiyogitā, tasya ca vedenānādinā'rādhyatayā pratipādanamapi pramāṇāntaraviruddhameva,
GSP28prakp11u:1263: devatādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 9. 1. 4] ca prapañcenāyamartho nirasta iti,
GSP28prakp11u:1271: na hi pramāṇāntarataḥ, śabdato vā puruṣasaṃskārahetutā yāgādīnāmavasīyata iti “karmāṇyārambhabhāvyatvādi” [mī. da. a. 11. pā. 1 sū. 20] tyatroktam /
GSP28prakp11u:1273: nanu kriyaiva kāryatayocyatām, phalasādhanatā ca tasyā evā'śrīyatām /
GSP28prakp11u:1274: tadanyathānupapattyā tu kiñcidapyaparaṃ tañjanyaṃ phalodayānuguṇaṃ kālāntarasthāyyātmāśrayaṃ parikalpyatām, mā bhūttasya liṅādivācyatā---iti
GSP28prakp11u:1277: na ca kriyājanyenānyena phalajanakena kalpitena kriyāyāḥ phalasādhanatopapāditā bhavati /
GSP28prakp11u:1278: na hi sādhanasādhanaṃ tasya sādhanaṃ bhavati, avāntaravyāpāro vā, śaktirvā tatsādhanatāṃ nirvāhayati
GSP28prakp11u:1280: karmaṇāmavāntaravyāpāraḥ, nāpi śaktiriti, na tasyār'thāpattigamyatā yuktā
GSP28prakp11u:1288: ṣaṣṭhādye tasyaiva kāryasya svasambandhitayā bodhyassvargakāmādirniyojya iti vyutpāditam /
GSP28prakp11u:1291: tasya ca kāryasya niyojyaviśeṣaṇībhūtakāmyotpattihetutvamiti bādaryadhikaraṇe [mī. da. 3. 1. 3] rāddhāntitam /
GSP28prakp11u:1292: tacca tathābhūtaṃ kāryaṃ kriyārūpaṃ na bhavati, tasyāḥ phalasādhanatvāyogāt /
GSP28prakp11u:1296: karmaṇaḥ, tacktervā sthāyitā neti cāpūrvādhikaraṇe [mī. da. 2. 1. 2.]
GSP28prakp11u:1298: ato niyojyānvayamukhena mānāntarāpūrvamātmasamavāyi kāryaṃ liṅādibhirabhidhayata ityanekanyāyasādhyam
GSP28prakp11u:1301: na ca cāsau bhāvārthamantareṇāstīti, 1298tatsambaddha evocyataiti bhāvārthādhikaraṇe [ 2. 1 . 1 ] sthitam /
GSP28prakp11u:1309: nanu bhāṣyakāraḥ---pratyayārthaṃ prayatnamityāha1299, na kriyādibhinnaṃ kāryamiti yo manyate, taṃ pratyāha---
GSP28prakp11u:1337: pradhānotpattiniyogā apyadhikāraniyogākṣiptasvaviṣayānuṣṭhānenaiva labdhasiddhaya iti, na tatra niyojyānvitābhidhānānveṣaṇam /
GSP28prakp11u:1346: tacca prayojanākaṅkṣitayā prayojanībhūtena sādhikāreṇa niyogenānvīyata iti, adhikāravākyagata eva liṅśabdastadanvitaṃ svārthamabhidhatte /
GSP28prakp11u:1351: nāsti tarhi prayājādiṣu niyogāntaram ? na nāsti, kṣaṇikānāṃ teṣāṃ sambhūyakaraṇopakārakatvānupapatterniyogāntarasyāvaśyāśrayaṇīyatvāt
GSP28prakp11u:1352: yo 'sau liṅādiḥ prāganūdyamānārthakatayā śaṅkitaḥ, sa idānīṃ niyogāntaramabhidhatte /
GSP28prakp11u:1367: yattadapūrvaṃ kāryam, tasya niyojyānvayaṃ vinā kāryatvānupapatteḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1368: anuṣṭhānaṃ vinā tadasambhavāt, kartrā ca vinā tadanupapatteḥ,
GSP28prakp11u:1369: adhikāreṇa1317 ca vinā kartturabhāvāt, niyojyatvaṃ vinā tadayogāt,
GSP28prakp11u:1370: akāmasādhane ca 1318kāmino niyogānavagamāditi, ātmasiddhyarthameva niyogaḥ kāmyamānaphalasiddhihetutvamavalambate, svāmivat /
GSP28prakp11u:1371: yathā'tmana eva saṃvidadhānassvāmī garbhadāsasyopakaroti, tathā niyogo 'pi
GSP28prakp11u:1373: nanu niyogasya phalasādhanatvāt, tasya ca setikarttavyatākakaraṇanibandhanasiddhitvāt, tadanuṣṭhānānantaraṃ niyogasiddheḥ phalasiddhissyāt, anantaraṃ niyogo 1320na niṣpadyate, tarhi kriyāyāmatītāyāṃ kutastatsiddhirityatrā'ha---
GSP28prakp11u:1374: viṣayānuṣṭhitau satyāṃ siddho na hi vidhiḥ phalam /
GSP28prakp11u:1384: itthaṃ yadyapi karmānuṣṭhānānantarameva niyogasiddhiḥ, tathāpi yat phalasyānantarābhavanam, tat upapattyā kalpyate---iti // 29 //
GSP28prakp11u:1406: anyathā yadi kaścitkalpite phale na pravartate, tadā kiṃ karttavyam // 30
GSP28prakp11u:1412: tena kāmādhikāre siddhe 'pūrvakāryābhidhāyakatve, nityādiṣvapi sa evār'tho
GSP28prakp11u:1438: tasyāṃ śabdasya pravṛttyanupayogitvāditi, kriyāniṣkṛṣṭakāryābhidhāyitā laukikavyavahārādeva nirṇīyate--iti // 33 //
GSP28prakp11u:1440: sitetara iva tveṣa pakṣaścittaṃ na karṣati /
GSP28prakp11u:1449: tathāpi tasya loke kriyāgatasyaiva pravarttakatvadarśanād, śakyate kriyāśritatā pratyetum
GSP28prakp11u:1453: yadi paraṃ tannibandhanavyavahāra eva1334 syāt, tadā taddarśanāttaddhetubhūtapratipattyanyathānupapattyānumānena
GSP28prakp11u:1460: lokapratītaṃ kriyārūpatvañca na śakyate 'pahnotumiti, kāryamātrārthatve kriyaiva kāryatayā liṅādyartha iti niścīyate, na punaḥ pramāṇāntarādapūrvam-iti // 37 //
GSP28prakp11u:1464: yadyācāryavacanādapi kriyaiva kāryatayā'vagamyate, tadā tasyāssvayaṃ duḥkharūpatvātpuruṣārthāntarānubandhanaṃ vina pravṛttyasambhavānniyamena
GSP28prakp11u:1471: ācāryavākyaśravaṇādapi śiṣyāṇāṃ yā sandhyopāsanādau pravṛttiḥ, tatrāpi bālassvaviṣayanirūpitaṃ kriyākāryatvāvagamameva kāraṇatvena parikalpayet,
GSP28prakp11u:1472: phalaṃ vinā ca tadanupapatteḥ phalāvagamamapi sambhāvayet /
GSP28prakp11u:1475: sa eva vālyadaśāyāṃ vyutpannassvayamācāryapadavīmadhiruḍho vedārthaṃ pratītya, śiṣyebhya upadiśan kriyāmeva kāryatayā pratipādayet, nāpūrvaṃ
GSP28prakp11u:1482: sarvathaiva1341 yato loke kriyā kāryaiva gamyate // 40 //
GSP28prakp11u:1489: apūrvaṃ hi kriyāsādhyaṃ sādhitā sādhanaṃ kriyā /
GSP28prakp11u:1494: tena yadyapyuktena nyāyenāpūrvameva kāryaṃ liṅādīnāmabhidheyam, tathāpi tasya kriyākāryatvāvyabhicārāt, tatra lakṣaṇayā tayornānupapattiḥ /
GSP28prakp11u:1495: yattu śrautapadārthe kārye loke liṅādi na prayujyata iti /
GSP28prakp11u:1497: kriyāsādhyantvapūrvam, sādhitā ca satī kriyā sādhanaṃ bhavatītyapūrveṇa
GSP28prakp11u:1499: yadyeṣā1346 lakṣaṇā, kimiti tarhi loko nāvagacchatītyāha---
GSP28prakp11u:1502: mukhyamarthamaviditvā lākṣaṇikamapyarthaṃ śrautamiva manyante, mlecchā iva yava-varāhādyartham
